enhanced_by.reason: The 'hasText' method checks if any element has non-blank text content, which is related to the 'text' method that retrieves the combined text of all matched elements.
The 'eachText' method retrieves the text content of each matched element, which can be used to set up test cases for 'hasText' by ensuring some elements have text content.
Both 'hasText' and 'text' methods deal with text content of elements, making 'text' a good candidate for asserting the results of 'hasText'.
The 'eachText' method provides a list of text contents for each element, which can be used to assert the presence of text content in elements checked by 'hasText'.
